properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan from Sturgeon Bay to Two Rivers WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Seul Choix Point to Rock Island Passage 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Point Betsie to Manistee MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan South of a line from Seul Choix Point to the Mackinac Bridge and North of a line from Charlevoix MI to South Fox Island 5NM offshore; Lake Michigan from Charlevoix to Point Betsie MI 5NM Offshore to mid lake; Lake Michigan from Rock Island Passage to Sturgeon Bay WI 5NM offshore to mid lake
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 8:49AM CST until January 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest gales to 35 knots with gusts up to 40 kt and
waves 7 to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...North part of Lake Michigan, north of a line from Two
Rivers WI to Manistee MI.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM CST WEDNESDAY
